extendedInfo.description: Take Us With You! Free Mobile Banking allows you to safely and securely access your Bank of Oklahoma account(s) anytime, using your Android enabled device, which also means you can literally do your banking wherever you are. With our App you can: * Mobile Deposit: Deposit checks with your phone!* Access balance information. * View pending transactions. * View transactions history, including check images. * Transfer funds. * Pay bills. * Utilize GPS to get one-touch access and directions to ATM and banking center locations.* Setup Mobile Alerts.Safe and Secure Access: Your security is of the utmost importance to us, which is why we've built the following safe access tools: * You set your own security access password. * No personal data is stored on your device. * Once you close the App or log out, your session will end. * Secure Socket Layer (SSL) is always used to encrypt your personal information such as Username, Password, and account information over the Internet. Enroll in Mobile Banking To enroll in Mobile Banking you must first be enrolled and have logged on to Online Banking. After doing so, simply download the free Bank of Oklahoma Android App*. You must have an Android device, (1.6 or later) in order to use our Mobile Banking App. Read the Online Banking, Online BillPay, and Mobile Banking Terms and Conditions for more details. *Check with your carrier for fees that may apply.

reviews.title: my life just got easier!!!!
reviews.comment: I loved using the ATM for my deposits but my life just got easier with the mobile app!!!  I\'m so hard on my cell phones,  I now have cheap Walmart phone and wasn\'t real sure it this would even work...well here to say Thank You Bank of Oklahoma for the mobile app.!!!  It took a few minutes load app. and I was making my first deposit!!! Save me time, gas and I no longer work around bank hours...it\'s all on my time!!! TIME IS MONEY---YOUR MONEY!!!
reviews.author: stacey davis

reviews.comment: Shouldn\'t let me log out until I sign out. Just easier and making sure I am officially signed out.
reviews.author: victor hedrick

reviews.title: Loooove this app!
reviews.comment: I love that its so easy to deposit checks!
reviews.author: Kayla Raney

reviews.title: Bad handling of camera in mobile deposit.
reviews.comment: While taking photos with my Samsung Galaxy S3, the check image is just fine on the screen until I take the picture, then the focus is readjusted incorrectly and make it very difficult to do.
reviews.author: Mike Mattice

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: The one thing that comes to mind that this app needs is an integrated calculator.   Having to switch to my calculator and then back to the app (requiring login again) is kind of a hassle.
reviews.author: Jim Hallock

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Very easy i\'m always checking my statements. Never had a problem with app
reviews.author: Dustin Gibson

reviews.comment: Great job, programming people
reviews.author: Nick Johnson

reviews.title: Mobile deposit is impossible
reviews.comment: There\'s no way to get my phone to take an app-acceptable photo.  Honestly, it would be much quicker for me to just walk to the bank branch a mile from my house than get the app to recognize my check!
reviews.author: Karen Lowe

reviews.title: very useful
reviews.comment: no more fighting the long lines at the bank. photo deposit is flawless. this app makes my banking very simple.  thanks b o k
reviews.author: Keith Matthews

reviews.title: Been good, even better now!
reviews.comment: Update is great, notifications are very flexible. UI needs a better color/design scheme though. I digress, great app!
reviews.author: Blake Flud

reviews.title: Decent app, but has room for improvement
reviews.comment: The app is good. It\'s pretty stable, and works as advertised. One annoying thing is that if you leave the app without explicitly logging out, it will suddenly pop up in 10 minutes to tell you it logged you out. That\'s a good thing from an account security perspective, but if I go back to the app before the 10 minutes is up I have to reenter my password as if I were logged out. Why not automatically log me out when I leave the app? Also, I wish it had a check register feature that would reconcile transactions as they clear. BOK is slow about posting transactions to my account (especially things like credit card payments or drafts to accounts outside of the bank), so I never trust the balance given online. It would be handy if I didn\'t have to keep a separate check register.
reviews.author: Kris Ryan Stallard

reviews.title: Check deposit from the cell!
reviews.comment: No more lines!  Just a few clicks and lines will have your check in your account consistently.
reviews.author: dallas dye

reviews.title: Cannot see bottom menu to use depositing service
reviews.comment: I am using an HTC One X with Ice Cream Sandwich. I cannot use this app for any service because the bottom menu doesn\'t appear. It is very frustrating and lowers the value of this app dramatically for myself.
reviews.author: Jevon Williams

reviews.title: Great Way to Save Money
reviews.comment: I\'m impressed with the accuracy and privacy of this app. I love that I do not have to rush to the bank to deposit a check, all it takes is a snapshot. :)
